feed.title: Code and Cappuccinos
feed.subtitle: A blog with an author who loves to code, and drink cappuccinos.

entry.title: I Made a Cute Logo for the Blog!

link.title: I Made a Cute Logo for the Blog!

entry.content:
Adobe Illustrator Makes Logo Making so Easy!

I'm super happy with my first logo design ever. It's simple but that's exactly why I like it. In case it's not too obvious, it's a cappuccino and the double ampersand (&&) which is used in lots of programming languages as the logical and operator!
entry.summary: Adobe Illustrator Makes Logo Making so Easy! I'm super happy with my first logo design ever. It's simple but that's exactly why I like it. In case it's not too obvious, it's a cappuccino and the double ampersand (&&) which is used in lots of programming languages as the logical and operator!

entry.title: I’m Not Very Good at This…

link.title: I'm Not Very Good at This...

entry.content:
Welcome to my online journal.

Or blog as they call it.

The concept of me writing down my thoughts and publishing them online is very new and strange to me. I feel as time goes by and I become more comfortable, my posts will become better and better. For now though, you're stuck with newbie Brittny.
entry.summary: Welcome to my online journal. Or blog as they call it. The concept of me writing down my thoughts and publishing them online is very new and strange to me. I feel as time goes by and I become more comfortable, my posts will become better and better. For now though, you're stuck with newbie Brittny.
